EmailTemplate.name: 08_08_2014 VMworld Teaser.Email_use
EmailTemplate.subject: Exclusive VMworld Teaser: Lego & Open Your Mind
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
This VMworld, we're blowing things wide Open. VMTurbo Operations Manager 4.7 Featuring Control for OpenStack(TM) Visit VMTurbo Booth #405 | There Is Hope. VMTurbo returns to VMworldTM for its fifth consecutive year, releasing a host of new capabilities in its core Operations Manager. Stop by Booth #405 for a Limited VMworld Edition VMT-Shirt, catch a Demo, check out our video game lounge, and enter to win one of several deluxe LEGO Star Wars Sets.
Experience the power of Software-Driven Control - the ability to assure application performance while using the infrastructure efficiently as possible - to know the end-to-end ramifications of any vMotion, Storage vMotion, or resize before you make them - and learn why VMTurbo is truly A New Hope for the Datacenter. Learn More <http://vmturbo.com/blog/vmworld-2014-preparing-hyperdrive/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=vmwteaser> 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
